trans-unit.source: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> permite que o conteúdo a ser exibido em uma área menor que o tamanho real.

trans-unit.source: When the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is not entirely visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando o conteúdo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> não está completamente visível, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> exibe barras de rolagem que o usuário pode usar para mover as áreas de conteúdo que é visível.

trans-unit.source: The area that includes all of the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is the extent.
trans-unit.target: A área que inclui todo o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> é a extensão.

trans-unit.source: The visible area of the content is the viewport.
trans-unit.target: A área visível do conteúdo é o visor.

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem física é usada para rolar conteúdo por um incremento físico predeterminado, geralmente por um valor declarado em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem lógica é usada para rolar para o próximo item na árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem física é o comportamento padrão de rolagem para a maioria dos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elementos.

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected.
trans-unit.target: Se seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> contiver um grande número de itens, o desempenho de rolagem pode ser afetado.

trans-unit.source: In this case, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, defina <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and to update only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que a exibição de conteúdo permaneça estático enquanto arrasta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> e atualizar somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: Because the scroll bars for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Como as barras de rolagem para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> elemento são definidas no estilo padrão do elemento, barras de rolagem não aparecerá se você aplicar um estilo personalizado para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

trans-unit.source: Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear.
trans-unit.target: Barras de rolagem devem ser definidas no estilo personalizado para que elas apareçam.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollViewer Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle ScrollViewer

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade a vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> controles, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, consulte [ScrollViewer estilos e modelos](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade estiver presente em ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> controle do modelo padrão e é definido usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> that contains some text and a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> que contém algum texto e um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The scroll bars appear only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: As barras de rolagem aparecem somente quando eles são necessários.

trans-unit.source: When you resize the window, the scroll bars appear and disappear.
trans-unit.target: Quando você redimensiona a janela, as barras de rolagem aparecem e desaparecem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> class.
The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
Arranges the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.

When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> method
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> método

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo" /> interface are allowed to scroll.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> scrolls in terms of logical units; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> scrolls in terms of physical units.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> rolar em termos de unidades lógicas; <see langword="false" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> rolar em termos de unidades físicas.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units.
trans-unit.target: Conteúdo em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> pode ser rolado em termos de unidades físicas ou unidades lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Physical units are device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Unidades físicas são pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Logical units are used for scrolling items within an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Unidades lógicas são usadas para rolar os itens dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is to use physical units to scroll its content.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> é usar unidades físicas para rolar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: However, in cases where the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, em casos onde o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é definido como `true`, o conteúdo pode usar unidades lógicas para rolar.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, and other controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>e outros controles que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> usar unidades lógicas para rolar.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items, instead of physical units.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `true`, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> propriedades serão o números de itens, em vez de unidades físicas.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem física é o comportamento padrão de rolagem para a maioria dos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elementos.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> is visible.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> that indicates whether the horizontal scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> que indica se a barra de rolagem horizontal está visível.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Hidden" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Hidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> is visible.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> that indicates whether the vertical scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> que indica se a barra de rolagem vertical está visível.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Visible" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
Gets the horizontal offset of the visible content.
The horizontal offset of the visible content.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo visível.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `true`, o conteúdo é rolado quando o usuário libera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> value does not change.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> valor não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> updates to the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário libera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> atualizações atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `false`, o conteúdo é rolado quando o usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> is always equal to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> é sempre igual à <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset" /> dependency property.
Gets the vertical offset of the visible content.
The vertical offset of the visible content.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical do conteúdo visível.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `true`, o conteúdo é rolado quando o usuário libera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> updates to the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário libera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> atualizações atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `false`, o conteúdo é rolado quando o usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> is always equal to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> é sempre igual à <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the extent.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o tamanho vertical da extensão.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> é apenas uma propriedade de saída; pode ser definido com eficiência, especificando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> do elemento de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `true`, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> propriedades serão o números de itens.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `false`, os valores dessas propriedades são Pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth" /> dependency property.
The element from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll" /> dependency property from a given element.
<see langword="true" /> if this element can scroll; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The element from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property from a given element.
The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
The object from which to get <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled" />.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled" /> property for the specified object.

<see langword="true" /> if the content is stationary when the user drags the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The element from which the property value is read.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration" /> property for the specified object.
The rate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
The element from which the property value is read.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode" /> property for the specified object.
A value that specifies how <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> reacts to touch manipulation.
The element from which the property value is read.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio" /> property for the specified object.
The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
The element from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property from a given element.
The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates that a control has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> defined in its style that defines custom keyboard scrolling behavior.
<see langword="true" /> if this control defines custom keyboard scrolling behavior; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se este controle define teclado personalizado rolagem comportamento; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `true`, keyboard input is not handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade retorna `true`, entrada do teclado não lida com a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

trans-unit.source: The parameters for hit testing within a visual object.
Performs a hit test to determine whether the specified points are within the bounds of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
The result of the hit test.
Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo rolado.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: A positive <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value corresponds to the content being offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: Um positivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> valor corresponde ao conteúdo que está sendo deslocado à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos são entre zero e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> menos o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado é descrito em Pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: A partir do .NET Framework versão 3.5 SP1, quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> continua a ser alterada enquanto a usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, mas não altera o modo de exibição de conteúdo até o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> representa o deslocamento de conteúdo visível e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> representa o deslocamento de conteúdo com base no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> posição.

Scrolling properties include offset, extent, or viewport.

trans-unit.target: Este método trata invalidação de outros elementos, como barras de rolagem, que dependem das propriedades de rolagem deste <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

<see langword="true" /> if the content is stationary when the user drags the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Exibir um grande número de itens pode causar problemas de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, pode ser útil usar rolagem adiada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [otimizando o desempenho: controles](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> content downward by one line.
This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não induz qualquer comportamento de rolagem se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> é `null`.

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem lógica é usada para rolar para o próximo elemento na árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Isso é diferente da rolagem física, que rolar o conteúdo por um incremento físico definido em determinada direção.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

Called when an internal process or application calls <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" />, which is used to build the current template's visual tree.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
The appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control.
Required arguments for this event.
Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.
The following keyboard input is recognized:
trans-unit.target: A seguinte entrada do teclado é reconhecida:

trans-unit.source: The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de seta para a esquerda: Rola uma linha à esquerda de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de seta para a direita: Rola uma linha à direita de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de seta para cima: rolar o conteúdo para cima em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de seta para baixo: rola para baixo de conteúdo em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page.
trans-unit.target: PAGE UP: Rolar o conteúdo para a parte superior da página atual.

trans-unit.source: PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page.
trans-unit.target: PAGE DOWN: Rolar o conteúdo para a parte inferior da página atual.

trans-unit.source: HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page.
trans-unit.target: Página inicial: Rola o conteúdo na parte superior da primeira página.

trans-unit.source: END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.
trans-unit.target: FIM: Rolar o conteúdo para a parte inferior da última página.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.
The rate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: A taxa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> desacelera em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] por milissegundo quadrado.

trans-unit.source: When a user scrolls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> by using touch, the user puts a finger on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: Quando um usuário rolar a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> usando o toque, o usuário coloca um dedo no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, passa o dedo na tela para uma pequena distância e, em seguida, comparações de precisão o dedo enquanto ele está se movendo.

trans-unit.source: The result of this is that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will continue to move after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: O resultado disso é que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> continuará a se mover depois que o usuário levante o dedo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration%2A> property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration%2A> propriedade especifica a taxa de rolagem reduz depois que o usuário levante o dedo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the way <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> reacts to touch manipulation.
A value that specifies how <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica como <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> reage a manipulação de toque.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scroll horizontally, vertically, or both.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> propriedade especifica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> rolar horizontalmente, verticalmente, ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> rolará quando um usuário arrasta um dedo no controle em um dispositivo de toque que dá suporte ao Windows Touch.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> can be either set directly on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> or used as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> pode ser definido diretamente em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> ou usado como uma propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: When a control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> as an attached property to specify the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle contém um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> no seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, usar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> como uma propriedade anexada para especificar o comportamento do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, defina <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> diretamente no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and adds several elements to it.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e adiciona vários elementos a ele.

trans-unit.source: In this example, when the size of the window changes, the size of `textblock1` also changes.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, quando o tamanho da janela muda, o tamanho de `textblock1` também será alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is too small to display all of the content, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> becomes scrollable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> é muito pequeno para exibir todo o conteúdo, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> se torna rolável.

trans-unit.source: The example sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.Both> so that the user can scroll the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> horizontally and vertically by using a finger.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.Both> para que o usuário pode rolar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> horizontalmente e verticalmente, usando um dedo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> e usa <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> como uma propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.VerticalFirst>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode> para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.VerticalFirst>.

trans-unit.source: This is so that when the user moves a finger horizontally before moving it vertically, the user highlights text.
trans-unit.target: Isso é para que quando o usuário move um dedo horizontalmente antes de movê-lo verticalmente, o usuário realça o texto.

trans-unit.source: The example sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.VerticalOnly> so that the user cannot select text by using a finger.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.VerticalOnly> para que o usuário não é possível selecionar o texto usando o dedo.

trans-unit.source: Note that setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.Both> also prevents the user from selecting text.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a configuração <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode> para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode.Both> também impede que o usuário seleciona o texto.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> property to <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>, so horizontal scrolling is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>, portanto, não é necessária a rolagem horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: O índice de deslocamento para traduzir o deslocamento de manipulação.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Quando um usuário arrasta um dedo em um objeto, ele é considerado uma manipulação de conversão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses that manipulation to scroll.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> usa essa manipulação rolar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio%2A> property specifies how much the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scrolls for each unit of translation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio%2A> propriedade especifica o quanto o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> rola para cada unidade de tradução.

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio%2A> is 2, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio%2A> é 2, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> rolará 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] para cada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] da manipulação de conversão.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that represents the vertical size of the content element that can be scrolled.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the content element that can be scrolled.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o tamanho vertical do elemento de conteúdo que pode ser rolado.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `true`, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> propriedades serão o números de itens.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `false`, os valores dessas propriedades são Pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged" /> routed event.

Gets or sets the element that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo" /> interface and provides values for scrolling properties of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
The element that controls scrolling properties, such as extent, offset, or viewport size.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que controla as propriedades de rolagem, como extensão, deslocamento ou visor.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls vertically to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> content.
This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não induz qualquer comportamento de rolagem se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> é `null`.

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem lógica é usada para rolar para o próximo elemento na árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Isso é diferente da rolagem física, que rolar o conteúdo por um incremento físico definido em determinada direção.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls vertically to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> content.
This method scrolls to both the vertical and horizontal end points of the content.
trans-unit.target: Esse método rola para ambos os pontos de extremidade verticais e horizontais do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não induz qualquer comportamento de rolagem se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> é `null`.

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Rolagem lógica é usada para rolar para o próximo elemento na árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Isso é diferente da rolagem física, que rolar o conteúdo por um incremento físico definido em determinada direção.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de rolagem física, em vez de rolagem lógica, encapsule o host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> propriedade `false`.

Scrolls the content within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> to the specified horizontal offset position.

trans-unit.source: The position that the content scrolls to.
Scrolls the content within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> to the specified vertical offset position.
The element on which to set the property value.
The property value to set.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll" /> dependency property to a given element.
The element on which to set the property value.
The property value to set.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property to a given element.
The object on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled" /> property.

<see langword="true" /> to have the content remain stationary when the user drags the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled" /> property for the specified object.
Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Exibir um grande número de itens pode causar problemas de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, pode ser útil usar rolagem adiada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [otimizando o desempenho: controles](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

trans-unit.source: The object on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration" /> property.
The rate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration" /> property for the specified object.
The object on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode" /> property.
A value that specifies how <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> reacts to touch manipulation.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode" /> property for the specified object.
The object on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio" /> property.
The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio" /> property for the specified object.
The element on which to set the property value.
The property value to set.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property to a given element.
Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o deslocamento vertical do conteúdo rolado.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: A positive <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> value corresponds to the content being offset to the top.
trans-unit.target: Um positivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> valor corresponde ao conteúdo que está sendo deslocado à parte superior.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos são entre zero e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> menos o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `true`, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> propriedades serão o números de itens.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `false`, os valores dessas propriedades são Pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: A partir do .NET Framework versão 3.5 SP1, quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> continua a ser alterada enquanto a usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, mas não altera o modo de exibição de conteúdo até o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> representa o deslocamento de conteúdo visível e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> representa o deslocamento de conteúdo com base no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> posição.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> should be displayed.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility" /> value that indicates whether a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility" /> que indica se uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> vertical deve ser exibida.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Visible" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o tamanho vertical do visor do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the visible area of the content.
trans-unit.target: O visor é a área visível do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> é apenas uma propriedade de saída; pode ser definido com eficiência, especificando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> do elemento de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `true`, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> propriedades serão o números de itens.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> é `false`, os valores dessas propriedades são Pixels independentes de dispositivo.
